product.name: Animals Talk, How Animals Communicate
product.author: Arthur Dorros
product.description: This terrific introduction to animal communication includes interesting facts, activities and easy-to-do experiments. "An excellent choice for sharing and reading aloud."—Booklist

product.name: Bad Kitty Does Not Like Dogs
product.author: Nick Bruel
product.description: A cat gone berserk and a poor, poor puppy go from A to Z and back in these infectious, hilariously illustrated alphabet books!

product.name: Bizcocho va a la escuela
product.author: Alyssa Satin Capucilli
product.description: These early readers feature a favorite, cuddly puppy who just can't stay out of trouble.

product.name: Cam Jansen and the Chocolate Fudge Mystery
product.author: David A. Adler
product.description: Cam Jansen, girl detective, records crime scenes with her photographic memory, and the details come in handy as the action-packed cases unfold.

product.name: The Mystery of the Stolen Diamonds
product.author: David A. Adler
product.description: Cam helps the police catch a diamond thief by using her amazing photographic memory.

product.name: Chicka Chicka Boom Boom
product.author: John Archambault
product.description: The rhythmic text reads like a skipping rope chant, as the letters attempt to climb the coconut tree, only to tumble down again.

product.name: La familia de Clifford
product.author: Norman Bridwell
product.description: Playful, loving, big, and warm, Clifford is "every child's idea of what a dog should really be!"—Elementary English

product.name: Clifford the Big Red Dog, Be a Good Friend
product.author: Norman Bridwell
product.description: Clifford knows that it takes more than size to Be Big! Be Big is a national campaign to show how small, simple actions can make the world a better place. Remember, it only takes a little to Be Big!

product.name: Flat Stanley
product.author: Jeff Brown
product.description: Children will dive right in to the exciting adventures of Stanley Lambchop, who finds opportunity in the fact that he's suddenly just a half an inch thick!

product.name: How Do Dinosaurs Go to School?
product.author: Jane Yolen
product.description: In soaring size and colossal colors, ten new dinosaurs demonstrate the fun and familiarity of school-day experiences. Yolen's lyric rhyme and Teague's irresistible dinosaurs return to charm fans, new and old, of this witty, rollicking series.

product.name: How I Became a Pirate
product.author: Melinda Long
product.description: Young Jeremy Jacob joins a pirate crew, and it's the best time of his life until he discovers all the warm, comfy things pirates DON'T do!

product.name: Llama Llama Red Pajama
product.author: Anna Dewdney
product.description: Baby Llama's fretful bedtime anxieties are humorously expressed through clever rhyme and vibrant, whimsical illustrations. "A real charmer!"—Booklist

product.name: Llama Llama Misses Mama
product.author: Anna Dewdney
product.description: Little Llama's anxieties, fears, and emotions are humorously and lovingly expressed through clever rhyme and vibrant, whimsical illustrations. "A real charmer."—Booklist

product.name: Don't Mess with Ninja Puppy
product.author: Nancy Krulik
product.description: This early chapter book stars Sparky a rambunctious puppy with a magic bone capable of transporting him to different places and times. Adventure is only a chew away!

product.name: Rain Forest Colors
product.author: Janet Lawler
product.description: Stunning photographs and flawless on-level information introduce young minds to the wonder and mystery of our world.

product.name: I am Abraham Lincoln
product.author: Brad Meltzer
product.description: These accessible illustrated comic-book style biographies feature characters from history as children themselves, as they recount the major events in their lives.

product.name: I am Jackie Robinson
product.author: Brad Meltzer
product.description: These accessible illustrated comic-book style biographies feature characters from history as children themselves, as they recount the major events in their lives.

product.name: I am Rosa Parks
product.author: Brad Meltzer
product.description: These accessible illustrated comic-book style biographies feature characters from history as children themselves, as they recount the major events in their lives.

product.name: La excursión
product.description: Join television favorite Peppa and her friends on their wonderful adventures!

product.name: Skippyjon Jones
product.author: Judy Schachner
product.description: Skippyjon, a Siamese cat with oversize ears, delights readers with the rousing adventures of his Zorro-like alter ego, El Skippito. "Ay carumba, mucho fun."—Kirkus

product.name: Splat the Cat
product.author: Rob Scotton
product.description: Impossibly fuzzy, somewhat shy, exceptionally expressive and full of childlike excitement and concerns, Splat is irresistibly appealing. "a welcome addition"—SLJ

product.name: Guess How Much I Love You
product.author: Sam McBratney
product.description: In this beautifully rendered board book, father and son Nutbrown Hares try to outdo one another in expressing their love.

product.name: Goldilocks and the Three Dinosaurs
product.author: Mo Willems
product.description: Willem's delightfully funny tale employs gentle irony and a reportorial style to present this "recount of events" from three hilarious characters. "His very best work so far."—Booklist, starred review

product.name: Where the Wild Things Are
product.author: Maurice Sendak
product.description: In this essential picture book, Max is sent to bed without his supper. In his room, he sails far away to a land of wild things!

product.name: Goodnight Moon
product.author: Margaret Wise Brown
product.description: In this modern classic, little Bunny says good night to all his favorite things. The perfect book for the end of the day.

product.name: Cloudy With a Chance of Meatballs
product.author: Judi Barrett
product.description: In the town of Chewandswallow, it rained orange juice for breakfast and hamburgers for lunch. But a storm of maple syrup sets off a sticky situation!

product.name: Too Many Tamales
product.author: Gary Soto
product.description: While making her family's Christmas Eve tamales, Maria tries on her mother's diamond ring—and now it's gone! "A warm family story."—SLJ, starred review

product.name: ¡Qué montón de tamales!
product.author: Gary Soto
product.description: A little girl must eat her way out of a quandry when she loses her mother's ring in the tamale batter. Captures "family unity and the warmth of the holidays."—Publishers Weekly

product.name: The Very Hungry Caterpillar
product.author: Eric Carle
product.description: A little caterpillar literally eats his way through the book, on his way to becoming a butterfly. "Every child should experience this wonderful, cumulative tale."—Kirkus

product.name: Dragons Love Tacos
product.author: Adam Rubin
product.description: Dragons love tacos, and they also like salsa. MILD salsa. Because when they eat spicy salsa, things get very heated up. "Zesty and fresh."—Publishers Weekly, starred review

product.name: The Absent Author
product.author: Ron Roy
product.description: Three good friends, Dink, Josh, and Ruth Rose, follow clues from A to Z in these easy-to-read chapter books that encourage readers to sleuth along and help solve the mystery!

product.name: Journey Through Our Solar System, All New, All True
product.author: Dr. Mae Jemison
product.description: True Books have been upgraded and updated. Information is presented in a thorough yet engaging manner, featuring lively sidebars, a glossary, visual back matter, and an index.

product.name: Being Your Best at Baseball
product.author: Nel Yomtov
product.description: True Books have been upgraded and updated. Information is presented in a thorough yet engaging manner, featuring lively sidebars, a glossary, visual back matter, and an index.

product.name: Amber Brown Is Feeling Blue
product.author: Paula Danziger
product.description: When her mom has Thanksgiving plans in Washington, and her dad wants her to be in New York City, they leave it to Amber to decide what to do.

product.name: Anna, Banana, and the Friendship Split
product.author: Anica Rissi
product.description: Sweet, simple chapter books explore the trials and cheers of elementary school friendships, featuring Anna, her wiener dog Banana, and best friends Sadie and Isabel.

product.name: Bad Kitty School Daze
product.author: Nick Bruel
product.description: Bad Kitty doesn't mean to be bad... does he? This outrageously funny chapter book series brings readers dangerously close to this irresistibly cranky cat. "Just plain hysterical." —Kirkus

product.name: The Adventures of Captain Underpants
product.author: Dav Pilkey
product.description: Hilarious comic book illustrations complement the outrageous, funny, action-packed storylines of these easy-to-read chapter books about a most unlikely superhero. Perfect for reluctant readers!

product.name: Captain Underpants and the Attack of the Talking Toilets
product.author: Dav Pilkey
product.description: Hilarious comic book illustrations complement the outrageous, funny, action-packed storylines of these easy-to-read chapter books about a most unlikely superhero. Perfect for reluctant readers!

product.name: Clementine
product.author: Sara Pennypacker
product.description: This lovable and realistic third grader has a huge heart, an observant eye, personality to spare, and a talent for trouble! "Well suited to reading alone or reading aloud."—Booklist

product.name: Dinosaurs Live On! And Other Fun Facts
product.author: Laura Lyn DiSiena
product.description: One thought leads to another in humorously illustrated, inviting fact filled series.

product.name: Encyclopedia Brown and the Case of the Soccer Scheme
product.author: Donald J. Sobol
product.description: The exciting, award-winning chronicles of everyone's favorite 10-year-old detective! Middle graders will love to solve the cases as the clues unfold around them!

product.name: Tales of a Fourth Grade Nothing
product.author: Judy Blume

product.name: A Team Divided
product.author: Tracey West
product.description: Based on the popular Cartoon Network series, these early chapter book adventures feature a team of ninjas out to save the world!

product.name: Minecraft Construction Handbook, An Official Mojang Book
product.author: Matthew Needler
product.description: Minecraft has been hailed as one of the greatest phenomena amongst gamers and educators for both its simplicity and its brilliance. These Official handbooks contain vital information to thrive and create in the world of Minecraft.

product.name: Ramona the Pest
product.author: Beverly Cleary
product.description: Ramona Quimby can be pesty, brave, blunderful—but always wonderful! "Cleary shows us life through Ramona's eyes and shows her young readers that they are not alone."—Kirkus

product.name: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe
product.author: C. S. Lewis
product.description: Four schoolchildren find their way into Narnia, where they come to the aid of Aslan, the golden lion, in his epic battle against the White Witch.

product.name: El autobús mágico y el calentamiento global
product.author: Joanna Cole
product.description: The indomitable Ms. Frizzle takes her students on a "bird’s eye" tour of the inside of bodies, hurricanes, and waterworks—things and places they couldn’t dream of are revealed from the inside out in these stories that are jammed full of science and fun.

product.name: The Truth About Bats
product.author: Eva Moore
product.description: Friz and the kids head out across the country in search of all kinds of bats, and learn where they live, what they eat, and whether or not they suck blood!

product.name: The Mouse and the Motorcycle
product.author: Beverly Cleary
product.description: Young mouse Ralph and his family live in a motel, and a new tenant arrives with a little toy motorcycle that's just the right size for a mouse!

product.name: Runaway Ralph
product.author: Beverly Cleary
product.description: Ralph S. Mouse runs away and everything goes downhill from there—literally! He meets many colorful characters, but knows, eventually, he must find his way home.

product.name: Komodo Dragon vs. King Cobra
product.author: Jerry Pallotta
product.description: Check out how these amazing real life creatures match up. Who's the strongest, fastest, biggest and baddest—in a fight to the finish, who would win?

product.name: The True Story of the 3 Little Pigs!
product.author: Jon Scieszka
product.description: This irresistible "revisionist" retelling of the traditional tale has become a classroom hit! "Alexander T. Wolf endeavors to set the record straight, and he does an admirable job of it."—NY Times

product.name: ¡La verdadera historia de los tres cerditos!
product.author: Jon Scieszka
product.description: This irresistible "revisionist" retelling of the traditional tale has become a classroom hit! "Alexander T. Wolf endeavors to set the record straight, and he does an admirable job of it."—NY Times

product.name: How to Eat Fried Worms
product.author: Thomas Rockwell
product.description: Billy needs $50 for a new minibike, so he accepts a crazy challenge! "A hilarious story that will revolt and delight unreachable intermediate-grade boys."—Booklist

product.name: James and the Giant Peach
product.author: Roald Dahl
product.description: After James Henry Trotter's parents are tragically eaten by a rhinoceros, he goes to live with his two horrible aunts, Spiker and Sponge. Life there is no fun, until James accidentally drops some magic crystals by the old peach tree and strange things start to happen.

product.name: Charlotte's Web
product.author: E. B. White
product.description: In this enduring classic, Wilbur, the barnyard pig, makes friends with a wonderful girl and a wise, little spider who saves his life.

product.name: Pippi Longstocking
product.author: Astrid Lindgren
product.description: Everything about irrepressible Pippi Longstocking is strange and wonderful and funny. Hold on to your hat—and your sides! Here comes Pippi!

product.name: Stuart Little
product.author: E. B. White
product.description: Stuart Little, a pleasant, debonair, 2-inch-tall mouse, has magnificent adventures throughout New York City as he seeks to rescue his friend, Margalo the bird.
